TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MatchCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示通过以迭代方式将正则表达式模式应用于输入字符串所找到的成功匹配的集合。

span.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该集合是不可变 （只读） 并且没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object. 集合包含零个或多对象。The collection contains zero or more objects. 如果匹配成功，具有一个填充集合找到输入字符串中的每个匹配项的对象。If the match is successful, the collection is populated with one object for each match found in the input string. 如果匹配不成功，则集合中不包含对象，并将其属性等于零。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains no objects, and its property equals zero. 将正则表达式模式应用于特定的输入字符串，则正则表达式引擎会使用两种技术之一生成对象：When applying a regular expression pattern to a particular input string, the regular expression engine uses either of two techniques to build the object: - 直接评估。Direct evaluation. 使用特定调用导致的所有匹配项，在一次，填充对象方法。The object is populated all at once, with all matches resulting from a particular call to the method. 使用此方法时集合的访问属性。This technique is used when the collection's property is accessed. 它通常是填充集合的昂贵方法中，需要更高的性能问题。It typically is the more expensive method of populating the collection and entails a greater performance hit. - 迟缓计算。Lazy evaluation. 对象，则需要根据匹配的项的填充。The object is populated as needed on a match-by-match basis. 它等效于正则表达式引擎调用方法重复并将每个匹配项添加到集合。It is equivalent to the regular expression engine calling the method repeatedly and adding each match to the collection. 通过访问集合时使用此技术其方法，或当访问使用`foreach`语句 （在 C# 中) 或`For Each`...`Next` （在 Visual Basic) 语句。This technique is used when the collection is accessed through its method, or when it is accessed using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each`...`Next` statement (in Visual Basic). 若要循环访问集合的成员，应使用由你的语言提供的集合迭代构造 (如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 而不是检索的枚举器返回方法。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类以便询问一套实例。The following example illustrates the use of the class to interrogate a set of instances. [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int arrayIndex);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int arrayIndex);

param.name: array
param.span: 要将集合复制到其中的数组。

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

summary.span: 从给定索引处开始将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合复制到数组中从给定索引处开始，因为目标数组都必须具有至少与整个集合一样大。Because the collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the entire collection. > [!WARNING] > 此成员中不存在[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果你正在开发应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用方法相反。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，尝试将集合复制已完全填充之前可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to copy the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值是在起作用，并且尝试查找单个匹配项超出该超时时间间隔，则可能会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: is a multi-dimensional array.
is outside the bounds of .
-or-

exception.span: 以及 在 的界限外。

span.span: plus is outside the bounds of .
A time-out occurred.

public int Count { get; }
.property instance int32 Count
Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of matches.
The number of matches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问的各个成员检索的值的集合的对象属性使正则表达式引擎填充使用直接计算的集合。Accessing individual members of the object by retrieving the value of the collection's property causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection using direct evaluation. ln 对比度，调用方法 (或使用`foreach`C# 中的语句和`For Each`...`Next`在 Visual Basic 中的语句) 使正则表达式引擎填充的集合作为需要使用迟缓计算的基础。ln contrast, calling the method (or using the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 直接评估可能会生成比迟缓计算集合的开销大得多方法。Direct evaluation can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因为对象通常使用迟缓计算中，尝试确定之前已完全填充的集合中的元素数可能会引发填充异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to determine the number of elements in the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值是在起作用，并且尝试查找单个匹配项超出该超时时间间隔，则可能会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定是否对的调用方法找到任何匹配项。The following example uses the property to determine whether the call to the method found any matches. 否则，它表示找到了匹配项。If not, it indicates that no matches were found. 否则为它枚举匹配项，并显示其值和从该处找到它们的输入字符串中的位置。Otherwise, it enumerates the matches and displays their value and the position in the input string at which they were found. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/cs/countex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/vb/countex1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式`\d+`匹配输入字符串中的一个或多个十进制字符。The regular expression pattern `\d+` matches one or more decimal characters in an input string.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();

summary.span: 提供一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: 包含 中所有 对象的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是调用方法来检索的枚举数可以循环访问对象在集合中，应使用的组迭代构造 (如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 由您的编程语言提供。in Visual Basic) provided by your programming language. 循环访问的成员对象使用方法 (或`foreach`C# 中的语句和`For Each`...`Next`在 Visual Basic 中的语句) 使正则表达式引擎填充的集合作为需要使用迟缓计算的基础。Iterating the members of the object using the method (or the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 这是类似于反复调用方法，，然后将添加到匹配结果对象。This is analogous to repeatedly calling the method, and then adding the resulting match to the object. 正则表达式引擎与此相反，使用直接计算来填充的集合在一次当访问属性。In contrast, the regular expression engine uses direct evaluation to populate the collection all at once when the property is accessed. 这可能生成比迟缓计算集合的开销大得多方法。This can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，尝试导航到集合的下一个成员可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to the next member of the collection may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值是在起作用，并且尝试查找下一个匹配项超出该超时时间间隔，则可能会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 此成员中不存在[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果你正在开发应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用属性改为。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the property instead.

span.span: Index into the collection.

summary.span: 获取该集合的单个成员。

span.span: Gets an individual member of the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中 位置的捕获子字符串。

span.span: The captured substring at position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，属性是一个索引器; 它在代码中，没有显式引用，但改为允许访问集合以进行就像它是数组。In C#, the property is an indexer; it is not explicitly referenced in code, but instead allows the collection to be accessed as if it were an array. 中的各项通常情况下，对象通过其索引，仅在集合中的项的总数目根据后属性。Typically, individual items in the object are accessed by their index only after the total number of items in the collection has been determined from the property. 但是，如果访问属性使正则表达式引擎使用直接计算生成的集合在一次。However, accessing the property causes the regular expression engine to use direct evaluation to build the collection all at once. 这是通常比循环访问集合使用开销更大方法，C#`foreach`语句或 Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next`语句。This is typically more expensive than iterating the collection using the method, the C# `foreach` statement, or the Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` statement. 因为通常填充对象通过使用迟缓计算，在尝试导航到特定的匹配项可能会引发异常。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to a specific match may throw a exception. 如果匹配操作的超时值是在起作用，并且尝试查找精确的匹配项超出该超时时间间隔，则可能会引发此异常。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a specific match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例分析 Nathaniel Hawthorne 的第一个句子*屋七个 Gables*并返回对象，其中包含与任一大写或小写"h"开头的所有单词。The following example parses the first sentence of Nathaniel Hawthorne's *House of the Seven Gables* and returns a object that contains all words that begin with either an uppercase or lowercase "h". 然后使用属性来检索每个单词，并将其显示到控制台。The property is then used to retrieve each word and display it to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/cs/RegEx_24804.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/vb/RegEx_24804.vb#1)] 此示例产生以下输出：The example produces the following output: ``` Half house huge ```

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than or equal to .
A time-out occurred.
